name: Super Smasher - Hit And Smash
description:
-Super Smasher is a causal game where you can smash the stack tower blocks with balls/stars.
-Press & hold to hit the light-colored block and avoid the dark-colored ones.
-Keep a continuous impact, collect energy bars, enjoy the thrill of continuous smashing.
-Smash the high-brightness energy blocks, and they'll make you instantly invincible.
-Challenge your friends on the Maximum Continuous Survival levels.
-Get this FREE game and have FUN!
